level.text: The Board shall be composed of the following:

Members and alternates appointed by the Mayor from among persons who are employees of the District of Columbia Government: one member and alternate, each from the District of Columbia Office of Personnel, Office of the Corporation Counsel, Department of Human Services, Metropolitan Police and Fire Departments; and
Two (2) members, one of whom shall be a physician, appointed from among persons who are not officers or employees of the District of Columbia Government.
The member and the alternate appointed from the Department of Human Services shall both be medical officers.

The member appointed from the Office of Personnel shall serve as Chairperson of the Board, and, in his or her absence, the member’s alternate shall serve as Chairperson; and in the absence of both, the member or alternate appointed from the Office of the Corporation Counsel shall serve as Chairperson.
A quorum shall consist of any five (5) principals or designated alternates, provided that one (1) of the five (5) present shall be the Chairperson or alternate as designated in ยง2500.3.
